/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades painted in shades of white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of blue and green. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of nature and urban infrastructure to the urban landscape. Cars and buses can be seen in the distance, hinting at the city's constant movement and energy.
